title: What I learned writing 90.000 words of interactive narrative (twice)

content:
Oi! I’m a designer/developer from Rio de Janeiro.
I’m passionate about #gamedev, #audio and #writing.
I also teach design and game development, but I’m currently not engaged in any teaching commitments. These days, most of my creative efforts are with Studio Bravarda.
Feel free to get in touch and take look around!
–
